mapper.select: SELECT A.FAQ_SEQ ,A.HOSP_CD ,A.FILE_GB ,A.QSTN_CONTS ,A.ANSR_CONTS ,B.USER_NM ,IFNULL(A.START_DT,'') START_DT ,IFNULL(A.END_DT,'') END_DT ,A.USE_YN ,A.SORT_SEQ ,A.REG_DTTM ,A.REG_USER ,A.REG_IP ,A.UPD_DTTM ,A.UPD_USER ,A.UPD_IP FROM TBL_FAQ_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_MST B ON B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.USER_ID = A.UPD_USER AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.UPD_DTTM DESC
SELECT 'Y' FROM TBL_FAQ_MST WHERE 1=1 AND FAQ_SEQ = #{faqSeq} AND ACTION_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.FILE_SEQ ,A.FILE_GB ,A.FILE_TITLE ,A.FILE_PATH ,A.HOSP_CD ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_DTTM ,A.REG_USER ,A.REG_IP ,A.UPD_DTTM ,A.UPD_USER ,A.UPD_IP ,B.SUB_CODE_NM ,A.FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_FILE_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE_DTL B ON B.CODE_GB = 'Z' AND B.CODE_CD = 'NOTI_GB' AND B.SUB_CODE = A.FILE_GB AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND A.FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq} AND A.FILE_GB = #{fileGb}
AND A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd}

SELECT A.FILE_GB, A.QSTN_TITLE, A.ASQ_SEQ , IFNULL(B.USER_NM,'') USER_NM , C.HOSP_NM , A.QSTN_CONTS, A.ASQ_SHARE, IFNULL(A.ANSR_CONTS,'') ANSR_CONTS , A.UPDATE_SW, A.REG_DTTM, A.REG_USER, A.REG_IP, A.READ_CNT , A.UPD_DTTM, A.UPD_USER, A.UPD_IP, IFNULL(A.QSTN_WAN,'') QSTN_WAN , IFNULL(A.ANSR_WAN,'') ANSR_WAN , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.QSTN_WAN,'') = 'Y' THEN '질문완료' ELSE '질문진행' END QSTN_STAT , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.ANSR_WAN,'') = 'Y' THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변진행' END ANSR_STAT FROM TBL_ASQ_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_MST B ON B.USER_ID = A.REG_USER AND B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN LEFT JOIN TBL_HOSP_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y'
AND A.HOSP_cd = #{hospCd}
AND IFNULL(A.QSTN_WAN,'') = 'Y'
AND IFNULL(A.ANSR_WAN,'') = 'Y'
AND (A.QSTN_TITLE LIKE CONCAT(#{qstnTitle},'%') OR A.QSTN_CONTS LIKE CONCAT(#{qstnTitle},'%') )
Order by A.REG_DTTM DESC

SELECT QSTN_TITLE , QSTN_CONTS , IFNULL(QSTN_WAN,'') QSTN_WAN , ANSR_CONTS , IFNULL(ANSR_WAN,'') ANSR_WAN , UPDATE_SW , FILE_GB , ASQ_SEQ , REG_DTTM , REG_USER , REG_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USER , UPD_IP FROM TBL_ASQ_MST WHERE ASQ_SEQ = #{asqSeq} AND ACTION_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ASQ_MST ( HOSP_CD, FILE_GB, QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_CONTS, REG_DTTM, REG_USER, REG_IP, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USER, UPD_IP, QSTN_WAN , JOB_SEQ , ACTION_YN ) VALUES ( #{hospCd2}, #{fileGb2}, #{qstnTitle}, #{qstnConts}, NOW(), #{regUser}, #{regIp}, NOW(), #{updUser}, #{updIp}, #{qstnWan}, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) + 1 ELSE 1 END FROM TBL_ASQ_MST A WHERE A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd2} AND A.FILE_GB = #{fileGb2} ) , 'Y' )
